**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- The golden religious symbol on the top of this spherical incense holder shifts its form to match the faith of its bearer. You gain no benefit from a _judgment thurible_ if you don't worship a deity or if your deity is true neutral. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 27.
  • **Armor** After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the thurible casts [_circle of protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=38) on you, with a duration of 1 round. You choose the alignment, which must be one opposed by one of your deity's alignments.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the weapon gains your choice of an [_anarchic_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=290), [_axiomatic_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291), [_holy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299), or [_unholy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307) rune until the end of your next turn. You can choose a rune only if it matches an alignment your deity has (_anarchic_ for chaotic, _axiomatic_ for lawful, _holy_ for good, or _unholy_ for evil).
Judgement Thurible **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 1.1 **Price** 975 gp --- Judgement Thurible (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 1.1 **Price** 14,000 gp --- The additional damage from the rune granted by the thurible is 2d6, and the spell DC is 35. Judgement Thurible (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 1.1 **Price** 65,000 gp --- The additional damage from the rune granted by the thurible is 2d6, and the spell DC is 43.
